Package capstone.Objects

Class User

java.lang.Object
capstone.Objects.User
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Admin, Customer, Teller
public class User extends Object implements Serializable
The superclass of all User classes in the application.

2020-11-1
Version:
1.0
Author:
Jia Hui, Bhargav

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the encoded bytes

    • decryptPassword

      private String decryptPassword()
      Decrypts the password stored as byte data, using the Base 64 encoding scheme as specified in RFC 4648 and RFC 2045.
      Returns:
      the raw password string

      Parameters:

      Returns:
